key.name: top-next-key
key.description: Advance to the next image on the top face of the cube.

key.name: top-next-button
key.description: Advance to the next image on the top face of the cube.

key.name: top-prev-key
key.description: Go back to the previous image on the top face of the cube.

key.name: top-prev-button
key.description: Go back to the previous image on the top face of the cube.

key.name: bottom-next-key
key.description: Advance to the next image on the bottom face of the cube.

key.name: bottom-next-button
key.description: Advance to the next image on the bottom face of the cube.

key.name: bottom-prev-key
key.description: Go back to the previous image on the bottom face of the cube.

key.name: bottom-prev-button
key.description: Go back to the previous image on the bottom face of the cube.

key.name: reflection
key.description: Render a reflective ground below the desktop cube.

key.name: ground-color1
key.description: Color of the ground (near).

key.name: ground-color2
key.description: Color of the ground (far).

key.name: ground-size
key.description: Size of the ground the reflection is rendered on. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: intensity
key.description: The intensity of the reflection. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: auto-zoom
key.description: Zoom out automatically to make the cube fit the screen.

key.name: zoom-manual-only
key.description: Zoom out automatically on mouse rotate only.

key.name: mode
key.description: The mode of the reflection. (0 = Jumpy, 1 = Jumpy reflection, 2 = Distance, 3 = Above)

key.name: deformation
key.description: The deformation mode. (0 = None, 1 = Cylinder, 2 = Sphere)

key.name: unfold-deformation
key.description: Apply the deformation in unfold cube mode.

key.name: cylinder-manual-only
key.description: Initiates cube cylinder deformation only if rotation is mouse driven.

key.name: deform-caps
key.description: Deform the cube caps also.

key.name: sphere-aspect
key.description: The aspect ratio of the deformed cube. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: draw-top
key.description: Draw the top face of the cube.

key.name: draw-bottom
key.description: Draw the bottom face of the cube.

key.name: adjust-top
key.description: Adjust the top face image to the rotation.

key.name: adjust-bottom
key.description: Adjust the bottom face image to the rotation.

key.name: top-scale
key.description: Scale the image to cover the top face of cube.

key.name: bottom-scale
key.description: Scale the image to cover the bottom face of cube.

key.name: top-aspect
key.description: Maintain top cap image aspect ratio.

key.name: bottom-aspect
key.description: Maintain bottom cap image aspect ratio.

key.name: top-clamp
key.summary: Clamp Top Face Image To Border
key.description: Clamp the top face image to the border. This is often the best, if your image doesn't fit the size of the cube or if it's transparent. It can lead to some ugly dotted lines when enabled (especially with large enough images) though.

key.name: bottom-clamp
key.summary: Clamp bottom face image to border
key.description: Clamp the bottom face image to the border. This is often the best, if your image doesn't fit the size of the cube or if it's transparent. It can lead to some ugly dotted lines when enabled (especially with large enough images) though.

key.name: top-images
key.description: List of .png and .svg files that should be rendered on the top face of the cube.

key.name: bottom-images
key.description: List of .png and .svg files that should be rendered on the bottom face of the cube.
